import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faAngular, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, faGolang, faAws, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' import './blockchain.png' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) return ( <>

I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.

If I need to define myself in one sentence that would be a family person, father of a beautiful daughter, a sports fanatic, photography enthusiast, and tech-obsessed!!!

) } export default About
